programme.title: Africa's Deadly Kingdom
programme.desc: In seemingly endless seas of green and shimmering gold, Africa's grasslands stretch out on an immense scale, home to some of the greatest gatherings of wildlife on earth. .

programme.title: Africa's Deadly Kingdom
programme.desc: The Kalahari. In this place of immense beauty, wonder and contrast all that live here are gifted with unique adaptations in order to survive.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Its the most wonderful time of the year! As PVS decks the halls, a reindeers hurt hoof threatens his Christmas Eve take-off. Dr. Pol treats an abandoned puppy discovered on a cold silent night. Dr. Nicole rushes to a cow that isnt acting right while Dr. Lisa assists a young cat struggling to breathe.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Dr. Pol performs emergency surgery on a dog that swallowed a rope toy. Dr. Nicole examines a tiny kitten with a big eye problem, and Dr. Lisa helps a horse suffering from heaves. A fungal infection glows on a Pomeranian while a lump grows on a Pitbull. The Pols celebrate their 55th wedding anniversary with cake decorated by grandkids, Silas and Abigail.

programme.title: Killer Shark Vs. Killer Whale
programme.desc: Killer Shark vs. Killer Whale examined an extraordinary incident that occurred at the Farallon Islands, 27 miles off San Francisco, in October 1997. Two killer whales attacked and drowned a great white shark and ripped out its liver. The incident left biologists mystified. Since then there have been more attacks internationally. What is happening between the two apex predators of the oceans?

programme.title: Killer Snakes
programme.desc: Packed with a potent neurotoxic venom, one family of snakes kill more people than any other on earth. Scientists around the world race to uncover how.
